price: 17 Qu’Allah soit donc glorifié à la fin et au lever du jour.
arabic: فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ حِينَ تُمۡسُونَ وَحِينَ تُصۡبِحُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fasub'ḥāna al-lahi ḥīna tum'sūna waḥīna tuṣ'biḥūna
